body_html: hmm... yes, I think we need that. I've been replying to a couple of emails this week about possible applicants being really confused about which skill-level we are looking for and whether they should apply at all.. Needless to say, I think we really need to assess their skills differently in the application because, well, self-assessment really doesn't work. Can I help out in any way?

body: hmm... yes, I think we need that. I've been replying to a couple of emails this week about possible applicants being _really_ confused about which skill-level we are looking for and whether they should apply at all.. Needless to say, I think we really need to assess their skills differently in the application because, well, self-assessment really doesn't work. Can I help out in any way?
